snippet: An antiterrorism court in Punjab Province on Wednesday sentenced two brothers accused of cannibalism each to 11 years and four months in prison.
lead_paragraph: An antiterrorism court in Punjab Province on Wednesday sentenced two brothers accused of cannibalism each to 11 years and four months in prison.

headline.main: Pakistan: Brothers Sentenced Again for Cannibalism
headline.print_headline: ASIA Pakistan: Brothers Sentenced Again for Cannibalism
